item.description:
As seen in Forbes (Best of the Web) and Cosmopolitan Magazine ("Top New Ways to Meet"), NetParty Events for Young Professionals are held in 15 U.S. cities at the hippest nightclubs and "combine business networking with social fun" (Forbes) (see photos).


NOTE:
You must RSVP at http://boston.netpart...

You are invited to RSVP for Free Admission to the NetParty's Boston Launch Party at The Estate. Over 400 young professionals are expected to attend!


RSVP and enjoy:


*Complimentary hors d'oeuvres from 6 pm - 7 pm

*Cool music played at a low volume to facilitate successful business and social networking from 6 pm - 8 pm

*Dancing courtesy of nationally renowned DJ Mike Dominico beginning at 8 pm

Mixing and mingling with hundreds of young, fun upscale professionals for business contacts as well as friendships!

For more information, please visit http://boston.netpart...


NOTE:
You must RSVP at http://boston.netpart...


The Estate is a former majestic theatre transformed into a two-floor, stunning, nightclub and lounge with luxurious ambiance, baroque accents, a distinctive fireplace, sparkling chandeliers, full-length mirrors. a grand space for meeting, mingling, networking and dancing and a wrap-around balcony. It is a Boston favorite for celebrity parties and special events.


The Estate is located in the 'Alley' in the Theatre District, just down on Boylston Place. from the Corners of Tremont and Boylston Streets.

group.name: Boston New In Town Meetup Group

item.name: NetParty Boston Free Launch Party - Free Admission
